title.en: A Prayer to Be Cared for in All Lives to Come

text.en: Veritable jewel arisen from the ocean of discipline of the three pure trainings,
text.en-trans: lab sum namdak tsultrim gyatsö yik

text.en: Through the light of your vast learning, you dispel the darkness of confusion.1
text.en-trans: mang tö nangwé mongpé münpa sel

text.en: The blessing of the Great Omniscient One2has arisen in your heart,
text.en-trans: künkhyen chenpö jinlab nying la shar

text.en: And you have perfected the experience of primordial purity and spontaneous presence—

text.en-trans: palden lama dé la solwa deb

text.en: Pray, hold me in your compassion in this and all my lives to come.
Cause us fortunate disciples to perfect the four visions
text.en-trans: kalden lob tsok nang zhi tarchin né

text.en: And lead all with a connection to the pure realm of Lotus Array.
text.en-trans: dreltsé pemo köpé zhing du drong
